paper_abstract: All up-date of the RACAH module is presented, adopted to Maple I I and 12, which supports both, algebraic manipulations of expressions from Racah's algebra as well as numerical computations of many functions and symbols from the theory of angular momentum. The functions that are known to the program include the Wigner rotation matrices and n-j symbols, Clebsch-Gordan and Gaunt coefficients, spherical harmonics of various kinds as well as several others.
paper_title: Maple procedures for the coupling of angular momenta. An up-date of the RACAH module
